collectible.title: Pink Baton
collectible.subtitle: Aggressively pink.
collectible.text: "What are you looking at, idiot? The game's already over, so you can stop gawking now. I mean it!"
collectible.unlock: Complete a game against Nonon where she loses.

collectible.title: Nonon's Panties
collectible.subtitle: Why do you have these?
collectible.text: "Fine! But nobody better go swiping these..."
collectible.unlock: Complete a game against Nonon where she loses on the Feminine Bedroom background.

collectible.title: Life Fiber Thread
collectible.subtitle: Requires further analysis.
collectible.text: Sample of life fiber bioorganic weapon. What is this stuff? Not dangerous, at least to the girl who was using it.
collectible.unlock: Introduce Nonon to Leon. If you put them close together, something might happen!
